about_the_game:
Embark on the ultimate cosmic quest where your typing prowess holds the key to victory! Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled voyage through the stars in Type Galaxy, the definitive typing adventure that will leave your fingers itching for more!

Key Features:

  • Journey Through the Cosmos
    Blast off into the unknown and navigate through 30 mind-bending levels set against the backdrop of the awe-inspiring cosmos.

  • Unleash Your Typing Skills
    Get ready to put your fingers to the test with exhilarating typing challenges that will push you to the limit. It is a race against time as you strive to conquer each level and prove yourself as the ultimate typist.

  • Immerse Yourself in the Soundtrack of the Stars
    Lose yourself in the mesmerizing beats of 32 electrifying soundtracks that pulse with the rhythm of the universe.

  • Command Your Spaceship with Precision
    In Type Galaxy, your keyboard is your spaceship's control panel, and your typing skills are the key to victory.

  • Ascend to Galactic Greatness
    Rise to the challenge and become the master of the cosmos as you conquer each level and unlock new challenges along the way. With every victory, you'll inch closer to typing supremacy and solidify your place among the stars.

Prepare to embark on the typing adventure of a lifetime in Type Galaxy. With its stunning visuals, heart-pounding gameplay, and addictive soundtrack, this is one journey you won't want to miss. Get ready to blast off into a world of typing excitement and become the ultimate typist!

name: Type Galaxy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
